name: CAT WITH THE MAKESHIFT KNIFE
description:
Made for Boss Rush Jam 2023 

This game is about a little cat who dreams of becoming the greatest warrior.

So join him on his silly little quest.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-CONTROLS-

Recommend Gamepad (ps can navigate menu with gamepad)

Attack left mouse or ( X )

Roll left shift/space or ( A )

move W,A,S,D or left joystick

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-CREDIT-

Everything in this game is made by me with in the time limit of the jam (excluding bird noises)

THANKS FOR CHECKING MY GAME OUT FEEL FREE TO LEAVE FEEDBACK
